verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> Blessed נְֽשׂוּי־ <S%H5375><s%> [is] forgiven פֶּ֗שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> [is he whose] transgression כְּס֣וּי <S%H3680><s%> [is] covered חֲטָאָֽה׃ <S%H2401><s%> [whose] sin

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> [is] the man לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַחְשֹׁ֬ב <S%H2803><s%> imputeth יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto whom the LORD ל֣וֹ עָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> not iniquity וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> there בְּרוּח֣וֹ <S%H7307><s%> and in whose spirit רְמִיָּה׃ <S%H7423><s%> [there is] no guile

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי <S%H2790><s%> When I kept silence בָּל֣וּ <S%H1086><s%> waxed old עֲצָמָ֑י <S%H6106><s%> my bones בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י <S%H7581><s%> through my roaring כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all the day

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> For day וָלַיְלָה֮ <S%H3915><s%> and night תִּכְבַּ֥ד <S%H3513><s%> was heavy עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> and יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thy hand נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> is turned לְשַׁדִּ֑י <S%H3955><s%> upon me my moisture בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי <S%H2725><s%> into the drought קַ֣יִץ <S%H7019><s%> of summer סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

חַטָּאתִ֨י <S%H2403><s%> my sin אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ <S%H3045><s%> I acknowledged וַעֲוֹ֘נִ֤י <S%H5771><s%> unto thee and mine iniquity לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not כִסִּ֗יתִי <S%H3680><s%> have I not hid אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אוֹדֶ֤ה <S%H3034><s%> I will confess עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and פְ֭שָׁעַי <S%H6588><s%> my transgressions לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> and You נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ <S%H5375><s%> and thou forgavest עֲוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity חַטָּאתִ֣י <S%H2403><s%> of my sin סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹ֡את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל <S%H6419><s%> pray כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone חָסִ֨יד ׀ <S%H2623><s%> For this shall every one that is godly אֵלֶיךָ֮ <S%H413><s%> to you לְעֵ֪ת <S%H6256><s%> unto thee in a time מְ֫צֹ֥א <S%H4672><s%> when thou mayest be found רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> in לְ֭שֵׁטֶף <S%H7858><s%> surely in the floods מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> of great אֵ֝לָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> they shall not come nigh

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> You סֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> Thou [art] my hiding place לִי֮ מִצַּ֪ר <S%H6862><s%> me from trouble תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי <S%H5341><s%> thou shalt preserve רָנֵּ֥י <S%H7438><s%> me about with songs פַלֵּ֑ט <S%H6405><s%> of deliverance תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי <S%H5437><s%> thou shalt compass סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H7919><s%> I will instruct וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ <S%H3384><s%> thee and teach בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> thee in the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> which תֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אִֽיעֲצָ֖ה <S%H3289><s%> I will guide עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> with עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> thee with mine eye

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּֽהְי֤וּ ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> Be ye not as the horse כְּפֶרֶד֮ <S%H6505><s%> [or] as the mule אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> have הָ֫בִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> [which] have no understanding בְּמֶֽתֶג־ <S%H4964><s%> in with bit וָרֶ֣סֶן <S%H7448><s%> and bridle עֶדְי֣וֹ <S%H5716><s%> whose mouth לִבְל֑וֹם <S%H1102><s%> must be held בַּ֝֗ל <S%H1077><s%> lest קְרֹ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> they come near אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> Many מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים <S%H4341><s%> sorrows לָרָ֫שָׁ֥ע <S%H7563><s%> [shall be] to the wicked וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> but he that trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD חֶ֝֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5437><s%> shall compass

שִׂמְח֬וּ <S%H8055><s%> Be glad בַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וְ֭גִילוּ <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> ye righteous וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ <S%H7442><s%> and shout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> for joy all [ye that are] upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart
